participant_1.background:

i have a career in party planning.

participant_2.background:
I binged on Ender's Game the whole day and then went online shopping.
In my spare time, I like to make people laugh.
I'm originally from the Midwest.
I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL.
i like spending time with my friends and family.

content.text: Hey there, what are you up to today?
I just finished binge watching Ender's Game and now I'm online shopping lol. What are you doing?
Haha nice I like that movie! I'm currently working on my dissertation.
It's on the role of party planning in social gatherings.
Oh that's interesting! I've never heard of that before.
Yeah I know it's a little different but I'm really passionate about it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thanks! So what are your hobbies?
Oh I like to make people laugh, spend time with my friends and family, and I'm originally from the Midwest.
Nice! I like to run track and I'm usually very shy.
Oh wow! I don't think I've ever met a shy runner before.
Haha yeah I know it's kind of weird but I just get really nervous when I'm around people.
That's okay I'm sure you're a great runner!
Well it looks like we have a lot in common! I'm sure we're going to be great friends.
